TopicTitle: Pod with Kerbal named "Debris" can't control it and "[" "]" keys do nothing

Articles.Content:
Launched into an orbit to try to see if I could dock and undock a pair of craft; upon separation of booster stage - the two pods were labeled as 'Debris".  No way to select them or switch to them.

Window showed a kerbal - but the only ship was the unmanned booster stage.

Have no idea where "Anbert Kerman" may be - but his soul is stuck in the booster.
